name: Moon Medicine
description:
You are a MOON DOCTOR. That means that you have to visit moons in this universe, armed with your trusty medical supply locker (it's mostly carrots), and convince a moon to start eating healthily.

This one in particular has a serious case of ALIEN INFECTION. Venture out of your spaceship and feed these aliens a healthy diet of carrots to calm them down and stop them from being so angry. They will probably try to throw you into the moon. Don't get eaten by the moon.

Do not get eaten by the moon.

WASD to move.

LMB to shoot a carrot.

Good luck!
